title: Letters Home
description: When a chance encounter reunites Ashley with Nick, a crush from her past, she couldn't have been happier. But when the full bodied girl finds out that her high school crush is only in town for a few days before he deploys to Afghanistan, her hopes of getting to rekindle their relationship fizzles.That is, until Nick, or Nico as she knows him, suggests they write each other letters like they used to do in class long ago. And as the letters start coming, Ashley finds herself falling in love with her soldier through the mail.Now the plus sized barista is just counting down the days until Nico comes back to her, but when he does, will the couple be able to stop his job, her schoolwork, and a crippling fear of rejection from destroying their relationship before it even starts?
author: Cindel Sabante
